title: Staff of Regrowth
summaries: The Staff of Regrowth is a tool that can be found in Ivy Chests as well as Jungle and Bramble Crates. Unlike other tools, it does not destroy most vegetation when swung, unless the tile is directly targeted. It also increases the yield of herbs and their seeds when harvesting them, and allows obtaining seeds from mature but non-blooming herbs, which is impossible with other tools. In addition, using the Staff of Regrowth on Dirt Blocks will plant grass, without the need for seeds.

On the <linked>[img:Legacy tModLoader version]</linked><linked> Legacy tModLoader version</linked>, the Staff of Regrowth can furthermore be used to grow <linked>moss</linked> on <linked>Stone Blocks</linked>. The type of moss will vary depending on the proximity to other types of moss, with the maximum range for same type of moss being 27 tiles. As such, one can spread the Lava Moss from the <linked>Cavern</linked>'s <linked>lava</linked> layers all the way up to the surface.
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.

statistics.Tooltip:
Creates grass on dirt
Increases alchemy plant collection when used to gather
